bwwExcerpt: Just For One Day is yet another jukebox musical, with all the boons and pitfalls such a work might imply. Its tracklist, studded with songs by everyone from Queen to Bryan Adams, is nearly as rousing as Live Aid itself, and Matthew Brind’s new arrangements lift the anthems of the 1980s to new heights.
